testcase.name: handleWeatherException_ShouldReturnErrorResponse
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-27T14:09:26.200+02:00 ERROR 146770 --- [weather-app] [ main] i.e.w.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler : Weather service error: City not found: NonExistentCity

testcase.name: handleWeatherException_WithNullMessage_ShouldReturnGenericError
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-27T14:09:26.222+02:00 ERROR 146770 --- [weather-app] [ main] i.e.w.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler : Weather service error: null

testcase.name: handleConstraintViolationException_ShouldReturnValidationError
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-27T14:09:26.365+02:00 ERROR 146770 --- [weather-app] [ main] i.e.w.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler : Validation error: Validation failed

testcase.name: handleRestClientException_ShouldReturnServiceUnavailableError
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-27T14:09:26.366+02:00 ERROR 146770 --- [weather-app] [ main] i.e.w.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler : External service error: Connection timeout

testcase.name: handleWeatherException_WithCause_ShouldReturnInternalServerError
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-27T14:09:26.368+02:00 ERROR 146770 --- [weather-app] [ main] i.e.w.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler : Weather service error: Failed to fetch weather data
